org.drombler.acp.core.data

Class AbstractDocumentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.acp.core.data.AbstractDataHandler<Path>
      • org.drombler.acp.core.data.AbstractPathHandler
        • org.drombler.acp.core.data.AbstractDocumentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, org.drombler.commons.context.LocalContextProvider, org.drombler.commons.data.DataHandler<Path>, org.softsmithy.lib.beans.Bean, org.softsmithy.lib.util.UniqueKeyProvider<Path>

    public abstract class AbstractDocumentHandler
extends AbstractPathHandler
    An abstract Path-based DocumentHandler. It observes registered DataCapabilityProviders and adds the found data capabilities to it's local context. You can use this class as a base class for your own document handler implementations.
    Author:
    puce
